questionTextEn: Has the State promulgated primary aviation legislation to ensure the provision of air navigation services (ANS) called for under Article 28 of the Chicago Convention?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State promulgated primary aviation legislation to ensure the provision of air navigation services (ANS) called for under Article 28 of the Chicago Convention?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the primary aviation legislation to verify that it addresses the provision of ANS. 2) Review the primary aviation legislation to verify that it addresses the provision of all elements of CNS/ATM services: communication, navigation and surveillance (CNS) services, including air traffic services, and air traffic management functions.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the primary aviation legislation to verify that it addresses the provision of ANS. 2) Review the primary aviation legislation to verify that it addresses the provision of all elements of CNS/ATM services.

questionTextEn: Has the State promulgated primary aviation legislation or specific operating regulations that address the provision of aeronautical information services (AIS)?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State promulgated primary aviation legislation or specific operating regulations that address the provision of aeronautical information services (AIS)?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the primary aviation legislation or specific operating regulations to verify that they address the provision of aeronautical information services (AIS). 2) Verify that the regulations establish the requirements for AIS to be provided in respect of the territory of the State and those areas over the high seas or in airspace of undetermined sovereignty in which the State has accepted the responsibility to provide air traffic services.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the primary aviation legislation or specific operating regulations to verify that they address the provision of aeronautical information services (AIS).

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements for the qualification and training of AIS personnel?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements for the qualification and training of AIS personnel?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish the requirements for the qualifications and competencies of AIS personnel. 2) Verify that the requirements include initial and recurrent training programmes.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish the requirements for the qualifications and competencies of AIS personnel.

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements to ensure that a quality system is implemented as part of the management system of the aeronautical information service?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements to ensure that a quality system is implemented as part of the management system of the aeronautical information service?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for a quality system to be implemented as part of the management system of the aeronautical information service. 2) Verify that the quality system includes quality policy, procedures, audits and corrective actions.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for a quality system.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that separation minima have been selected from those prescribed in the provisions of PANS-ATM and Regional Supplementary Procedures?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that separation minima have been selected from those prescribed in the provisions of PANS-ATM and Regional Supplementary Procedures?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the documents used by the ANSP to verify that the separation minima applied are those prescribed in PANS-ATM and Regional Supplementary Procedures. 2) Verify that where other separation minima are applied, such minima have been determined by the State through the conduct of a safety assessment.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the documents used by the ANSP to verify that the separation minima applied are those prescribed in PANS-ATM.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that the types of air traffic services provided and the areas of responsibility are clearly defined?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that the types of air traffic services provided and the areas of responsibility are clearly defined?
guidanceEn: 1) Review published aeronautical information to verify that the types of ATS provided are clearly defined. 2) Verify that the areas of responsibility (FIRs, control areas, control zones) are established and published.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review published aeronautical information to verify that the types of ATS provided are clearly defined.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that ATS operational procedures are established for air traffic control units?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that ATS operational procedures are established for air traffic control units?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the ATS operational procedures to verify that they address all relevant aspects of ATC operations. 2) Verify that procedures include coordination between ATC units, transfer of control, and emergency procedures.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the ATS operational procedures to verify that they address all relevant aspects of ATC operations.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that flight plan processing procedures are established?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that flight plan processing procedures are established?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the procedures for flight plan processing to verify their conformance with ICAO provisions. 2) Verify that procedures address the submission, acceptance, distribution and storage of flight plans.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the procedures for flight plan processing to verify their conformance with ICAO provisions.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that an integrated aeronautical information package is published, comprising the AIP, its amendments and supplements, AIP supplements, AIC, NOTAM and PIB?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that an integrated aeronautical information package is published, comprising the AIP, its amendments and supplements, AIP supplements, AIC, NOTAM and PIB?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the components of the integrated aeronautical information package. 2) Verify that all required components are published and maintained current. 3) Verify that the AIP is amended regularly through the AIRAC system.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the components of the integrated aeronautical information package.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that NOTAM are originated and issued in accordance with ICAO provisions?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that NOTAM are originated and issued in accordance with ICAO provisions?
guidanceEn: 1) Review a sample of NOTAM to verify compliance with the ICAO NOTAM format. 2) Verify that NOTAM are distributed in a timely manner. 3) Verify that procedures exist for NOTAM origination, processing and distribution.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review a sample of NOTAM to verify compliance with the ICAO NOTAM format.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that electronic terrain data are made available to meet needs of users requiring terrain information in support of safety-related aeronautical applications?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that electronic terrain data are made available to meet needs of users requiring terrain information in support of safety-related aeronautical applications?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the provision of electronic terrain data. 2) Verify that terrain data sets are made available with appropriate resolution and accuracy. 3) Verify that data quality requirements are met.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the provision of electronic terrain data.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that the AIRAC cycle is used for the publication of significant changes affecting air navigation?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that the AIRAC cycle is used for the publication of significant changes affecting air navigation?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the AIP amendment procedures to verify use of the AIRAC system. 2) Verify that significant changes are published at least 42 days in advance. 3) Review a sample of recent AIP amendments for compliance.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the AIP amendment procedures to verify use of the AIRAC system.

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements for the provision of communication services to support air traffic services?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements for the provision of communication services to support air traffic services?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for CNS systems. 2) Verify that requirements address both aeronautical fixed and mobile communication services.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for CNS systems.
icaoReferences: A10 Vol II Part I; A11 Chapter 6

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements for the provision of navigation services, including radio navigation aids?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements for the provision of navigation services, including radio navigation aids?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for navigation services. 2) Verify that requirements address conventional navigation aids (VOR, DME, NDB, ILS) and GNSS-based navigation.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for navigation services.

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements for the provision of surveillance services?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements for the provision of surveillance services?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for surveillance services. 2) Verify that requirements address primary and secondary surveillance radar, ADS-B and multilateration systems.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for surveillance services.
icaoReferences: A10 Vol IV; A11 Chapter 2; PANS-ATM Chapter 8

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that communication, navigation and surveillance equipment is maintained to provide the required level of safety?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that communication, navigation and surveillance equipment is maintained to provide the required level of safety?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the maintenance programme for CNS equipment. 2) Verify that preventive and corrective maintenance procedures are established. 3) Review maintenance records for compliance.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the maintenance programme for CNS equipment.
icaoReferences: A10 Vol I, II, IV; A11 Chapter 2

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that instrument flight procedures are designed in accordance with ICAO provisions?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that instrument flight procedures are designed in accordance with ICAO provisions?
guidanceEn: 1) Review a sample of instrument flight procedures (SIDs, STARs, approach procedures). 2) Verify that procedure design criteria conform to PANS-OPS. 3) Verify that procedures are validated before publication.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review a sample of instrument flight procedures.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that requirements for flight inspection are established and periodical flight inspections are provided for radio navigation aids?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that requirements for flight inspection are established and periodical flight inspections are provided for radio navigation aids?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the flight inspection requirements and procedures. 2) Verify that flight inspections are conducted at prescribed intervals. 3) Review flight inspection records for compliance.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the flight inspection requirements and procedures.

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements for the provision of meteorological services for international air navigation?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements for the provision of meteorological services for international air navigation?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for meteorological services. 2) Verify that requirements address the provision of METAR, TAF, SIGMET, and other MET products.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for meteorological services.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that meteorological observations are made at aerodromes and transmitted to users?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that meteorological observations are made at aerodromes and transmitted to users?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the procedures for aerodrome meteorological observations. 2) Verify that METAR and SPECI are issued in accordance with ICAO provisions. 3) Verify that observations are transmitted to users in a timely manner.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the procedures for aerodrome meteorological observations.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that aerodrome forecasts (TAF) are issued in accordance with ICAO provisions?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that aerodrome forecasts (TAF) are issued in accordance with ICAO provisions?
guidanceEn: 1) Review a sample of TAF messages for compliance with ICAO format. 2) Verify that TAF are issued at the required times. 3) Verify that TAF amendment procedures are established.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review a sample of TAF messages for compliance with ICAO format.

questionTextEn: Does the State ensure that SIGMET information is issued for en-route weather phenomena hazardous to aircraft?
questionTextFr: [FR] Does the State ensure that SIGMET information is issued for en-route weather phenomena hazardous to aircraft?
guidanceEn: 1) Review a sample of SIGMET messages for compliance with ICAO provisions. 2) Verify that SIGMET are issued for all prescribed phenomena. 3) Verify coordination procedures between MWO and ACC.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review a sample of SIGMET messages for compliance with ICAO provisions.

questionTextEn: Has the State established requirements for the provision of search and rescue (SAR) services?
questionTextFr: [FR] Has the State established requirements for the provision of search and rescue (SAR) services?
guidanceEn: 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for SAR services. 2) Verify that the requirements address SAR organization, coordination and training.
guidanceFr: [FR] 1) Review the regulations to verify that they establish requirements for SAR services.
